categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mericci was a male Human Battalion Commander of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3640 BBY he participated in the Battle of Corellia, but was pulled out along with the rest of Imperial forces following the Darth Malgus's coup. He made a temporary stop at the Vaiken Spacedock, where he urged fellow Imperials to assist General Adele Konya in the still ongoing Battle for the Black Hole.
